law.text: A building constructed and leased to the Commonwealth under a built-to-suit lease agreement shall be constructed: (a) In accordance with all applicable state and national safety, building, and construction code requirements; and (b) To last, at a minimum, for a period of thirty (30) years.
law.history: Created 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 54, sec. 11, effective July 14, 1992.
